short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for automatically reloads web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fresh Automation is a Chrome extension that will reload the webpage automatically until this page has the expected results.

Features:
- Set the endpoint If you want to reload.
- Set Goal that you expected after webpage reloaded.
- Set the time interval for the webpage reload.

If you have problems or have suggestions, feel free to tell me.
